modName: UNPB TBBP conversion for zzjay's Hentai China dress
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a conversion of Hentai China dress UNP by zzjay. It adds UNPB TBBP weighted meshes to the base mod using BodySlide 2 Outfit Studio. This mod is Meshes only. It is TBBP,BBP,HDT compatible. You must have a TBBP compatible skeleton or you will CTD. You must have TBBP animations or HDT Havok Physics Extensions to see stuff jiggle! :)

Requirements:It requires the original mod - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63635/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63635/[/url]
TBBP compatible skeleton. Like XP32's XP32 Maximum Skeleton - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800[/url]
TBBP animations or HDT Havok Physics Extensions. Technically you don't have to have them but there's no need to use this mod if you don't... 

Install (Manual only)
---------------------
Install Hentai China dress and Hentai Hana dress for UNP by zzjay.
Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim's Data folder, yes to overwrite files.

Removal (Manual only)
---------------------
These files will be removed when the base mod is removed.

Disclaimers: This mod contains meshes for the Hentai China dress only. I did not convert Hentai Hana dress. 
BACKUP your files before using this mod!!!
If you don't like how it looks or it doesn't work for you, copy original meshes back over these.

Known Issues:None so far. I have done in-game testing on my game and it's settings only. Did not see any clipping for the poses I used. Your experience may vary.

All Credit go to the original authors:

-Caliente's Bodyslide 2 and Outfit Studio, so easy to use even a n00b can do it.
-zzjay for the original mod
-Dimon99 for UNP body
-xp32 for UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT
-MrTroubleMaker for TBBP meshes
author: ezrider57
